step_feedback.feedback: You extended your arm overhead well and opened your hand wide.  The fist and open hand movements were smooth.
Good job keeping your arm overhead. Focus on fully opening your palm and fingers to maximize the pumping action.
You're doing a great job coordinating your breathing with the hand movements. Keep visualizing the fluid moving.
While you made a good attempt at the fist, try to fully clench your fist and tighten your arm muscles more during inhalation.  This will improve the pumping action.

exercise_summary: You performed the overhead pumping exercise well, coordinating breathing with hand movements.  Focus on fully clenching your fist and tightening your arm muscles for a more effective pump. Remember to visualize fluid moving out of your arm with each repetition.
